location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 4 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter informing him that the HC Cruizer Elphinstonewas proceeding to Bombay with an important dispatch received the previous day from the Envoy to the Court of Persia, and stating that the Elphinstonehas been dispensed for this duty owing to the tranquil state of the Persian Gulf. The letter concludes by informing that Mr Clerk of the Bengal Civil Service and Ensign Ralph of HM Regiment have taken the opportunity to return to India on the vessel too.
